dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset captures scenes from rural, city, and highway areas around Karlsruhe, Germany, and is used for depth estimation and pose estimation tasks.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: V. Guizilini
R. Ambrus
S. Pillai
A. Raventos
A. Gaidon
dcterms:description: The Dense Depth for Autonomous Driving (DDAD) dataset contains samples with long-range depth (up to 250 m) from a diverse set of urban scenarios in multiple cities in the United States and Japan.
dcterms:title: Dense Depth for Autonomous Driving (DDAD)
